tool_description: Competitions, Matches & real-time Odds for the Asian Giant SingBet.
name: SingBet
title: SingBet

api_list.name: Odds (early)
api_list.description: Use the sportslug and the GID from the "Matches (early)" endpoint to get pre-game Odds from SingBet Sportsbook.

required_parameters.name: sportslug
required_parameters.description: soccer: ft / basketball: bk / tennis: tn

api_list.name: Sportslugs
api_list.description: Retrieves all available sports and their sportslugs needed for the endpoints.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://singbet.p.rapidapi.com/singbet/sportslug"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "singbet.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://singbet.p.rapidapi.com/singbet/sportslug"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "singbet.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
